scripts.boot: pnpm list --depth -1 --recursive --json > workspace-packages.json && node ./scripts/workspace.js boot && npm run model-schema generate
scripts.build: del-cli output/production && cross-env NODE_ENV=production next build
scripts.build-check: del-cli output/production && cross-env NODE_ENV=production ANALYZE=true next build
scripts.test:start-app: npm run compile && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run local-services start && kill-port 4800 && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc next dev -p 4800
scripts.test:run: npm run compile && cross-env NODE_ENV=test playwright test
scripts.test: del-cli output/test && kill-port 4800 && cross-env NODE_ENV=test tsx ./scripts/test.ts run-with-app
scripts.clean: del-cli output tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && pnpm --filter pkg-* run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run local-services reset
scripts.dev: npm run compile && kill-port 4000 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development next dev -p 4000
